00033 IOApplication::IOApplication( const char name[], bool have_input, bool have_output ): Application( name ), m_input( have_input ), m_output( have_output )
00034 {
00035     if ( have_input ) {
00036         parameters["in"] = std::string();
00037         parameters["in"].setDescription( "input file or dataset" );
00038         parameters["rf"] = std::string();
00039         parameters["rf"].needed() = false;
00040         parameters["rf"].hidden() = true;
00041 
00042         parameters["rf"].setDescription( "Override automatic detection of file suffix for reading with given value" );
00043         parameters["rdialect"] = std::string();
00044         parameters["rdialect"].needed() = false;
00045         parameters["rdialect"].setDescription(
00046             "choose dialect for reading. The available dialects depend on the capabilities of IO plugins" );
00047     }
00048 
00049     if ( have_output ) {
00050         parameters["out"] = std::string();
00051         parameters["out"].setDescription( "output file" );
00052         parameters["wf"] = std::string();
00053         parameters["wf"].needed() = false;
00054         parameters["wf"].setDescription( "Override automatic detection of file suffix for writing with given value" );
00055         parameters["wf"].hidden() = true;
00056 
00057         parameters["wdialect"] = std::string();
00058         parameters["wdialect"].needed() = false;
00059         parameters["wdialect"].setDescription( "choose dialect for writing. The available dialects depend on the capabilities of IO plugins" );
00060         std::map<unsigned short, std::string> types = util::getTypeMap( false, true );
00061         // remove some types which are useless as representation
00062         // "(unsigned short)" is needed because otherwise erase would take the reference of a static constant which is only there during compile time
00063         types.erase( ( unsigned short )data::ValuePtr<util::Selection>::staticID );
00064         types.erase( ( unsigned short )data::ValuePtr<std::string>::staticID );
00065         types.erase( ( unsigned short )data::ValuePtr<boost::posix_time::ptime>::staticID );
00066         types.erase( ( unsigned short )data::ValuePtr<boost::gregorian::date>::staticID );
00067         types.erase( ( unsigned short )data::ValuePtr<util::ilist>::staticID );
00068         types.erase( ( unsigned short )data::ValuePtr<util::dlist>::staticID );
00069         types.erase( ( unsigned short )data::ValuePtr<util::slist>::staticID );
00070 
00071         for( std::map<unsigned short, std::string>::iterator i = types.begin(); i != types.end(); i++ ) {
00072             i->second.resize( i->second.find_last_not_of( '*' ) + 1 );
00073         }
00074 
00075         parameters["repn"] = util::Selection( types );
00076         parameters["repn"].needed() = false;
00077         parameters["repn"].setDescription(
00078             "Representation in which the data shall be written." );
00079     }
00080 
00081     if( have_input || have_output ) {
00082         parameters["np"] = false;
00083         parameters["np"].needed() = false;
00084         parameters["np"].setDescription( "suppress progress bar" );
00085         parameters["np"].hidden() = true;
00086     }
00087 }
00088 
00089 IOApplication::~IOApplication()
00090 {
00091     data::IOFactory::setProgressFeedback( 0 );
00092 }
00093 
00094 bool IOApplication::init( int argc, char **argv, bool exitOnError )
00095 {
00096     if ( ! util::Application::init( argc, argv, exitOnError ) )
00097         return false;
00098 
00099     if ( m_input ) {
00100         return autoload( exitOnError );
00101     }
00102 
00103     return true;
00104 }
00105 void IOApplication::printHelp( bool withHidden ) const
00106 {
00107     util::Application::printHelp( withHidden );
00108 
00109     if( withHidden ) {
00110         std::cerr << std::endl << "Available IO Plugins:" << std::endl;
00111         data::IOFactory::FileFormatList plugins = data::IOFactory::getFormats();
00112         BOOST_FOREACH( data::IOFactory::FileFormatList::const_reference pi, plugins ) {
00113             std::cerr << std::endl << "\t" << pi->getName() << " (" << pi->plugin_file.file_string() << ")" << std::endl;
00114             std::cerr << "\t=======================================" << std::endl;
00115             const std::list<util::istring> suff = pi->getSuffixes();
00116             const std::list<std::string> dialects = util::stringToList<std::string>( pi->dialects( "" ) );
00117             std::cerr << "\tsupported suffixes: " << util::listToString( suff.begin(), suff.end(), "\", \"", "\"", "\"" )  << std::endl;
00118 
00119             if( !dialects.empty() )
00120                 std::cerr << "\tsupported dialects: " << util::listToString( dialects.begin(), dialects.end(), "\", \"", "\"", "\"" )  << std::endl;
00121         }
00122     }
00123 }
00124 
00125 bool IOApplication::autoload( bool exitOnError )
00126 {
00127     std::string input = parameters["in"];
00128     std::string rf = parameters["rf"];
00129     std::string dl = parameters["rdialect"];
00130     bool no_progress = parameters["np"];
00131     LOG( Runtime, info )
00132             << "loading " << util::MSubject( input )
00133             << ( rf.empty() ? "" : std::string( " using the format: " ) + rf )
00134             << ( ( !rf.empty() && !dl.empty() ) ? " and" : "" )
00135             << ( dl.empty() ? "" : std::string( " using the dialect: " ) + dl );
00136 
00137     if( !no_progress ) {
00138         data::IOFactory::setProgressFeedback( &feedback );
00139     }
00140 
00141     images = data::IOFactory::load( input, rf, dl );
00142 
00143     if ( images.empty() ) {
00144         if ( exitOnError )
00145             exit( 1 );
00146         else
00147             return false;
00148     } else {
00149         for( std::list<data::Image>::const_iterator a = images.begin(); a != images.end(); a++ ) {
00150             for( std::list<data::Image>::const_iterator b = a; ( ++b ) != images.end(); ) {
00151                 const util::PropertyMap &aref = *a, bref = *b;
00152                 LOG_IF( aref.getDifference( bref ).empty(), Runtime, warning ) << "The metadata of the images from "
00153                         << aref.getPropertyAs<std::string>( "source" ) << ":" << std::distance<std::list<Image> ::const_iterator>( images.begin(), a )
00154                         << " and " << bref.getPropertyAs<std::string>( "source" ) << ":" << std::distance<std::list<Image> ::const_iterator>( images.begin(), b )
00155                         << " are equal. Maybe they are duplicates.";
00156             }
00157         }
00158     }
00159 
00160     return true;
00161 }

00163 bool IOApplication::autowrite( Image out_image, bool exitOnError )
00164 {
00165     return autowrite( std::list<Image>( 1, out_image ), exitOnError );
00166 }
00167 
00168 bool IOApplication::autowrite( std::list<Image> out_images, bool exitOnError )
00169 {
00170     const util::Selection repn = parameters["repn"];
00171     const std::string output = parameters["out"];
00172     const std::string wf = parameters["wf"];
00173     const std::string dl = parameters["wdialect"];
00174     LOG( Runtime, info )
00175             << "Writing " << out_images.size() << " images"
00176             << ( repn ? std::string( " as " ) + ( std::string )repn : "" )
00177             << " to " << util::MSubject( output )
00178             << ( wf.empty() ? "" : std::string( " using the format: " ) + wf )
00179             << ( ( !wf.empty() && !dl.empty() ) ? " and" : "" )
00180             << ( dl.empty() ? "" : std::string( " using the dialect: " ) + dl );
00181 
00182     if( repn != 0 ) {
00183         BOOST_FOREACH( std::list<Image>::reference ref, out_images ) {
00184             ref.convertToType( repn );
00185         }
00186     }
00187 
00188     data::IOFactory::setProgressFeedback( &feedback );
00189 
00190     if ( ! IOFactory::write( out_images, output, wf, dl ) ) {
00191         if ( exitOnError )
00192             exit( 1 );
00193 
00194         return false;
00195     } else
00196         return true;
00197 }
00198 
00199 Image IOApplication::fetchImage()
00200 {
00201     Image ret = images.front();
00202     images.pop_front();
00203     return ret;
00204 }
